```{r setup}
#| include: false
library(jsonlite)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)
library(tidyr)
library(DT)
library(bslib)

# 读取数据
lottery_data <- fromJSON("data/lottery_data.json")

# 数据预处理函数
format_currency <- function(x) {
  paste0("¥", format(x, big.mark=",", scientific=FALSE))
}

# 创建数据表格
create_lottery_table <- function(data, type) {
  if(type == "ssq" || type == "qlc") {
    df <- data.frame(
      期号 = data$period,
      开奖号码 = sapply(1:length(data$numbers), function(i) paste(data$numbers[[i]], collapse=" ")),
      奖池金额 = format_currency(data$poolAmount),
      stringsAsFactors = FALSE
    )
  } else if(type == "fc3d") {
    df <- data.frame(
      期号 = data$period,
      开奖号码 = sapply(1:length(data$numbers), function(i) paste(data$numbers[[i]], collapse="")),
      stringsAsFactors = FALSE
    )
  } else if(type == "kl8") {
    df <- data.frame(
      期号 = data$period,
      开奖号码 = sapply(1:length(data$numbers), function(i) paste(data$numbers[[i]], collapse=" ")),
      stringsAsFactors = FALSE
    )
  }
  return(df)
}
```

# 双色球分析 {.storyboard}

## Column {width=650}

### 奖池金额趋势

```{r}
#| title: 双色球奖池金额趋势
ssq_pool_trend <- ggplot(data.frame(
    period = lottery_data$ssq$period,
    amount = lottery_data$ssq$poolAmount
  ), aes(x = period, y = amount)) +
  geom_line(color = "red") +
  geom_point() +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(title = "双色球奖池金额趋势",
       x = "期号",
       y = "奖池金额（元）")

ggplotly(ssq_pool_trend)
```

### 红球出现频率

```{r}
#| title: 红球出现频率分析
ssq_red_freq <- lottery_data$ssq$numbers %>%
  head(6) %>%
  table() %>%
  as.data.frame() %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = ., y = Freq)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity", fill = "red") +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(title = "红球出现频率",
       x = "号码",
       y = "频次")

ggplotly(ssq_red_freq)
```

### 开奖数据 {.tabset}

```{r}
#| title: 双色球开奖数据
ssq_data <- create_lottery_table(lottery_data$ssq, "ssq")
datatable(ssq_data,
          options = list(
            pageLength = 10,
            dom = 'ftip',
            scrollX = TRUE
          ),
          rownames = FALSE,
          class = 'compact stripe hover')
```

# 快乐8分析

## Column

### 号码分布热图

```{r}
#| title: 快乐8号码分布
kl8_heatmap <- lottery_data$kl8$numbers %>%
  table() %>%
  as.data.frame() %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = ., y = "频次", fill = Freq)) +
  geom_tile() +
  scale_fill_gradient(low = "white", high = "red") +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(title = "快乐8号码分布热图")

ggplotly(kl8_heatmap)
```

# 福彩3D分析

## Column

### 各位数字分布

```{r}
#| title: 福彩3D数字分布
fc3d_digit_dist <- lottery_data$fc3d$numbers %>%
  as.data.frame() %>%
  gather(position, number) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = number)) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 1, fill = "blue", alpha = 0.7) +
  facet_wrap(~position) +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(title = "福彩3D各位数字分布")

ggplotly(fc3d_digit_dist)
```
